name: Ornito
description:
We specialize in delivering solutions that encourage positive transformation of our society through the development of unique technology products that promote new learning experiences in the community.
How do we get there?
Ensuring that every new project is seen as a unique moment of great value to customers, employees, suppliers, partners and shareholders, making the work environment a place with a sole purpose of mutual cooperation, progress and happiness in the commitment to pursue and meet the maximum satisfaction of customer expectations by delivering the best solution through the most advanced technology while maximizing the use of resources to generate a sustainable profit.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Rua Dr. Diogo de Faria, 55, Sala 64
